Sentence: Suddenly Haemon enters and Antigone asks Haemon to hold her (Antigone) with all his (they) strength
Creon urges her (Antigone) to find Haemon and marry quickly
The Messenger delivers the news: Antigone had just been immured, when the crowd heard Haemon's moan from within
Haemon then stabbed himself and lay beside Antigone in a pool of blood
Upon being told of Haemon's death, Eurydice finished her (Antigone) row of knitting, climbed to her (Antigone) room, and cut her (Antigone) throat
